SEARCH
Package util

Class AppointmentOutcomeManager

java.lang.Object
util.AppointmentOutcomeManager
public class AppointmentOutcomeManager extends Object
Manages the creation, retrieval, and persistence of appointment outcome records and prescriptions. This class is a singleton that provides centralized management for:
  • Loading and saving appointment outcome records and prescription data from files.
  • Creating new outcome records and updating prescription statuses.
  • Retrieving records for patients or prescriptions pending fulfillment.
The class interacts with two CSV files:
  • outcome_records.csv for appointment outcome data.
  • prescriptions.csv for prescription details.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AppointmentOutcomeManager getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the manager.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of AppointmentOutcomeManager.

    • getPatientOutcomeRecords

      public List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getPatientOutcomeRecords(String patientId)
      Retrieves all outcome records for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects associated with the patient.

    • getPendingPrescriptions

      public List<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> getPendingPrescriptions()
      Retrieves all outcome records that include pending prescriptions. Pending prescriptions are those with a PrescriptionStatus.PENDING status.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects containing pending prescriptions.

    • createOutcomeRecord

      public boolean createOutcomeRecord(AppointmentOutcomeRecord record)
      Creates a new appointment outcome record and saves it to persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      record - The AppointmentOutcomeRecord object to create.
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully created, false if a record with the same appointment ID already exists.

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public boolean updatePrescriptionStatus(String appointmentId, String medicationName, PrescriptionStatus newStatus)
      Updates the status of a prescription for a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment.
      medicationName - The name of the medication to update.
      newStatus - The new PrescriptionStatus to set.
      Returns:
      true if the prescription status was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getOutcomeRecord

      public AppointmentOutcomeRecord getOutcomeRecord(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves an outcome record by appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The AppointmentOutcomeRecord object associated with the given ID, or null if not found.
